author: boudoul
body:
This PR is intended to described a new scenario for the Tracker Phase2  Upgrade as requested by CMSupgrade /LHCC in which the first layer of the outer Tracker is removed ,This  was intended to kept out an official release, but the statistics needed to validate it the order of what we can get in relvals (too big for a private samples at high PU) - This scenario is not a baseline , therefore no forward port to 74X is foreseen .

A second PR will follow later corresponding to conditions for the digi-reco steps (bad modules) - But I prefer to discouple the geometry part and the reco part 

I replaced Extended2023Muon4Eta (unused)  by this scenario (BE5DPixel10DLHCC) in runThematrix
therefore it can be tested with 146XX
title: Removing tracker layer scenario
